1.title: Black Books
1.content: Black Books are added by the Dragonborn DLC. When you read one, you are transported to Apocrypha to complete a dungeon. Upon doing so, you are rewarded with a choice from 3 powers (only 1 for Waking Dreams which concludes the Dragonborn questline.) . | Book | Power 1 | Power 2 | Power 3 | . | Epistolary Acumen | Dragonborn Flame (Fire Breath creates fire wyrms on kills) | Dragonborn Force (Unrelenting Force deals more damage) | Dragonborn Frost (Frost Breath freezes enemies for 15 seconds) | . | Filament and Filigree | Secret of Arcana (spells are free for 30 seconds) | Secret of Protection (half damage for 30 seconds) | Secret of Stength (free power attacks for 30 seconds) | . | The Hidden Twilight | Mora‚Äôs Agony (AoE poison and knockback for 30 seconds) | Mora‚Äôs Boon (fully heal health, magicka, stamina) | Mora‚Äôs Grasp (freeze target for 30 seconds) | . | The Sallow Regent | Seeker of Might (+10% to combat skills and Smithing) | Seeker of Sorcery (+10% to magic skills and Enchanting) | Seeker of Shadows (+10% to stealth skills and Alchemy) | . | Untold Legends | Secret Servant (holds items) | Black Market (buys/sells items) | Bardic Knowledge (AoE stamina regen) | . | Waking Dreams | Perk Point Reset | ¬† | ¬† | . | The Winds of Change | Companion‚Äôs Insight (no damage to followers) | Scholar‚Äôs Insight (double skill book points) | Lover‚Äôs Insight (10% better prices/damage with opposite sex) | .

2.title: Breeding Reference
2.content: . | How to Breed in Scarlet/Violet | Where to find Ditto | Egg Power Sandwiches | Useful Breeding Items | Useful Training Items | EV Training | EV Removal | IV Ratings | . How to Breed in Scarlet/Violet . Breeding in Pokemon SV is done in the Picnic mechanic. Any time two Pokemon with compatible egg groups are in a picnic together, there is a random chance over time to generate an egg in the picnic basket at the end of your picnic table. Simply walk to it and press A to check for eggs. This can be a slow process, but can be done while AFK and requires no action from the player. It can also be sped up significantly using Sandwiches which grant Egg Power. Where to find Ditto . Ditto, which are able to breed with any breedable Pokemon, can be found in West Province Area Two and Three. They will disguise themselves as other Pokemon in the area, but can be revealed by using ZL to focus them which will show their name (or ???) if you haven‚Äôt encountered one before. Egg Power Sandwiches . Eggs can be used to increase the speed at which your pokemon lay eggs. You start the game with the Jam Sandwich recipe, but may eventually want to upgrade to the Great Peanut Butter sandwich later. Level 3 requires herba mystica and isn‚Äôt really much of an improvement: . | Egg Power 1: Jam Sandwich - Strawberry, Jam | Egg Power 2: Great Peanut Butter - Banana, Peanut Butter, Butter | . Useful Breeding Items . | Item | Where to Get | What it Does | . | Everstone | Delibird Presents | Allows Pokemon to pass down their nature to children. | . | Destiny Knot | Delibird Presents | 5 IVs will be passed down from parents | . Useful Training Items . | Item | Where to Get | What it Does | . | Silver Bottle Cap | Delibird Presents, Raid Drops | Boosts a single IV to max. | . | Gold Bottle Cap | Porto Marinada Auction | Boosts all IVs to max. | . | Ability Capsule | Tera Raids | Changes a Pokemon‚Äôs ability to its other standard Ability | . | Ability Patch | Tera Raids | Changes a Pokemon‚Äôs ability to its Hidden Ability | . | Nature Mints | Chansey‚Äôs Goods | Changes a Pokemon‚Äôs nature to the one in the mint‚Äôs name. | . | Mirror Herb | Delibird Presents (Cascarrafa) | Allows a pokemon to fill empty ability slots with egg moves from other Pokemon during picnics | . EV Training . | Item | Where to Get | What it Does | . | Protein | Chansey‚Äôs Goods/Tera Raids | Increases Attack EVs by 10 | . | Calcium | Chansey‚Äôs Goods/Tera Raids | Increases Special Attack EVs by 10 | . | Iron | Chansey‚Äôs Goods/Tera Raids | Increases Defense EVs by 10 | . | Zinc | Chansey‚Äôs Goods/Tera Raids | Increases Special Defense EVs by 10 | . | HP Up | Chansey‚Äôs Goods/Tera Raids | Increases HP EVs by 10 | . | Carbos | Chansey‚Äôs Goods/Tera Raids | Increases Speed EVs by 10 | . | Power Bracer | Delibird Presents | Boosts Attack EVs gained after battle | . | Power Lens | Delibird Presents | Boosts Special Attack EVs gained after battle | . | Power Belt | Delibird Presents | Boosts Defense EVs gained after battle | . | Power Band | Delibird Presents | Boosts Special Defense EVs gained after battle | . | Power Weight | Delibird Presents | Boosts HP EVs gained after battle | . | Power Anklet | Delibird Presents | Boosts Speed EVs gained after battle | . EV Removal . If you‚Äôve trained EVs you don‚Äôt want, use these berries to get rid of them. Note that the first berry immediately reduces EVs to 100 if they are above 100, so you need a maximum of 11 to fully reset a stat: . | Item | Where to Get | What it Does | . | Kelpsy | Tera Raids/Sparkling Pickups in East Province Area 2 | Decreases Attack EVs by 10 | . | Hondew | Tera Raids/Sparkling Pickups in East Province Area 2 | Decreases Special Attack EVs by 10 | . | Qualot | Tera Raids/Sparkling Pickups in East Province Area 1 | Decreases Defense EVs by 10 | . | Grepa | Tera Raids/Sparkling Pickups in East Province Area 1 | Decreases Special Defense EVs by 10 | . | Pomeg | Tera Raids/Sparkling Pickups in East Province Area 2 | Decreases HP EVs by 10 | . | Tamato | Tera Raids/Sparkling Pickups in East Province Area 1 | Decreases Speed EVs by 10 | . IV Ratings . After beating the game, you can see an assessment of each of your Pokemon‚Äôs IVs in its summary. Below is a translation of what each of the descriptions mean: . | Description | IV Range | . | No Good | 0 | . | Decent | 1-15 | . | Pretty Good | 16-25 | . | Very Good | 26-29 | . | Fantastic | 30 | . | Best | 31 | .

Plant them by the 4th or use Speed Gro! . | Trade one to the statue in Secret Woods for a Stardrop! | . | May want to invest in animals before Winter starts . | It‚Äôs possible to finish Greenhouse in year 1 during Fall if you complete all the Pantry bundles | . | . Grange Display Tips . | Wiki page | You can take all your items back after judging is done. (Check Mayor‚Äôs lost and found if you forget.) | Easiest way to get first place is to display 9 items from 6 or more of the following categories, with an average of 4.11 points or higher. | Animal: . | Any animal product with gold or higher quality guarantees 5 points. | . | Artisan: . | Cheese/Mayonnaise give 5+ points at silver quality or higher. | Most wines give 5+ points unless from forageable berries. | Poppy and Fairy Rose honey give 5+ points. | . | Cooking: . | Virtually any cooked food is 5+ points if it‚Äôs gold quality. | Pizza is 5 points and is sold at the Saloon. | . | Fish: . | Any iridium quality fish is 6+ points. Silver star Catfish is 5 points and caught in the river during rain in fall. | . | Forage: . | All forage is 5+ points at Iridum quality. Most is 5+ even at gold. | . | Fruit: . | Pineapple and Starfruit are 5+ at any quality. | Most fruit is 5+ at Gold quality. | All fruit is 5+ at Iridium quality. | . | Minerals: . | 5+: Bixite, Diamond, Dolomite, Fire Opal, Helvite, Neptunite, Prismatic Shard, Star Shards | . | Vegetables: . | Most are 5+ at gold quality. | Everything is 6+ at Iridium quality. | . | . 4.title: Welcome
4.content: Welcome to Dancer‚Äôs Game - a website of various notes and articles I‚Äôve written about games I played. I generally aim to structure such articles as information-dense quick reference tools that can quickly get you up to speed on all relevant details about a certain aspect of a game. If you enjoy this type of content, then you‚Äôre in the right place!! .

8.title: Legend of Mana
8.content: Legend of Mana is a JRPG game originally released by Squaresoft for PS1. It has since had a remastered release on Steam. Handy Links: . | Tempering calculator: https://forge.grendel.fr/ | Useful guide on many LoM topics: https://legendofmana.info | .

13.title: Mindas Ruins
13.content: Artifact: Ancient Tablet Boss: Count Dovula . The puzzle in this map revolves around the Flower Keys: . Talking to them will cause them to move left/right. The position the flower key is standing in represents a gate that will block the path of the corresponding gateway.
